lu.uni.geko.util.bridges
Class EcoreBridge

java.lang.Object
  lu.uni.geko.util.bridges.EcoreBridge

public final class EcoreBridge
extends Object

A utility class hiding details of the Ecore metamodel part of the Eclipse Modeling Framework API for recurring tasks that are not project-specific.

(Note that it is disputable whether this class conforms to the bridge pattern as we are currently only providing one implementation and the "abstractions" can be regarded as low-level.)

Constructor Summary
private EcoreBridge()
          Utility classes should not have a public or default constructor.

isReallyIndirectlyContained

public static boolean isReallyIndirectlyContained(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject eObject,
                                                  Collection<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> possibleContainers)
Returns whether the given eObject is contained indirectly in the given collection. Returns false if the eObject is contained in the collection but no member of the collection is a real ancestor of the eObject (i.e. different from the eObject).

Parameters:
eObject - an eObject
possibleContainers - a collection of possible containers
Returns:
true when the given EObjects is contained in a member of the collection but not itself member of the collection

Parameters:
eObject - an EObject
possibleContainers - a collection of possible container EObjects
Returns:

ensureUpperBoundNotExceeded

public static boolean ensureUpperBoundNotExceeded(List<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> currentValues,
                                                  org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EStructuralFeature feature,
                                                  List<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> elementsToAdd,
                                                  String actionMessage)
Ensures that the upper bound of the given feature will not be exceed once the given elements are added to the the given current values. RuntimeException if the upper bound would be exceeded and returns true otherwise. The given action message is only used for output.

Parameters:
currentValues - a list containing the current values of the given feature
feature - a structural feature
elementsToAdd - a list of elements to be newly added to the feature
actionMessage - a message describing the action to be performed if the bound is not exceeded (only for error output)
Returns:
true if the upper bound of the given feature will not be exceeded once the given elements are added

ensureUpperBoundNotExceeded

public static boolean ensureUpperBoundNotExceeded(int currentSize,
                                                  org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EStructuralFeature feature,
                                                  List<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> elementsToAdd,
                                                  String actionMessage)
Ensures that the upper bound of the given feature will not be exceed once the given elements are added to it using the given current size (that may be different from the real current size (for convenience). Throws a RuntimeException if the upper bound would be exceeded and returns true otherwise. The given action message is only used for output.

Parameters:
currentSize - the current total number of values of the given feature
feature - a structural feature
elementsToAdd - a list of elements to be newly added to the feature
actionMessage - a message describing the action to be performed if the bound is not exceeded (only for error output)
Returns:
true if the upper bound of the given feature will not be exceeded once the given elements are added
